observation: The Shannon Jones Team | Serving Long Beach Since 1998  Skip to main content Buyers Property Search Our Listings Featured Listings Mortgage Calculator Buyer’s Guide Lifestyle Searches Sellers Why Sell With Us Instant Home Valuation Our Recent Sales Seller’s Guide Real Estate Marketing Selling With Shannon Our Areas Virtual Real Estate Blog About The Team Keller Williams Success Stories Client Events Giving Back Newsletter Archive Contact 562-896-2456 Menu Serving the Long Beach Area Since 1998. Search for a Home Free Home Valuation Our mission is to be the leading real estate resource in the Long Beach area, by providing excellent customer service, guidance & education, and building long-lasting client relationships. Explore Long Beach Other Cities in Los Angeles County Cities in Orange County Hire The Experts Whether you’re planning to buy, sell, or invest in property, a real estate transaction is a major financial transaction and you deserve a real estate team that is knowledgeable, experienced, and dedicated to looking out for your best interests. Each member of The Shannon Jones Team is committed to and focused on delivering exceptional customer service, providing the highest caliber of marketing, and negotiating to help each client get a great deal. Let us know how we can help. Talk to an Expert Buying If you’re considering buying a house, condo, or investment property in Long Beach, California or surrounding communities, we want to provide you with the services and information that will help you make the best decision for your needs. We will provide you with research and data to help you with the decision-making process. We will help you explore neighborhoods, refer you to contractors or awesome lenders. We will negotiate to help you get the best deal and assist you throughout the transaction and beyond. We want to be your Realtors for life. Selling Selling a home or other real estate in Long Beach, California or surrounding communities can be a great experience if you have a Realtor who provides you with the latest market information and honest advice about pricing & staging your home along with an incredible marketing plan and great negotiating skills. The Shannon Jones Team strives to get each of our sellers the highest price with the least amount of inconvenience. Investing Real estate is one of the best investments you can make. Whether you are considering purchasing your very first real estate investment or you’re a seasoned investor with a number of properties, we will consult with you to determine your short and long term goals and help you locate a property that meets your needs. We can help you with the financial analysis to determine whether a property will meet your short- or long-term goals. Latest Blog Posts Long Beach CA Real Estate Market Update April 2024 While nationally, the news media has touted a recent increase in housing inventory, the latest Long Beach housing market statistics paint a different picture. As we look back at the latest Long Beach… Read More Tips For Making Your Home Eco-Friendly Earth Day is a great time to reflect on how we can make our homes more eco-friendly. By taking small but significant steps, we can help lower our overall impact on the environment. It's a team effort,… NAR & the European Sales Model Everyone is talking about the proposed NAR settlement and what it means for sellers and buyers. Will commissions drop? Who will pay? We might see the sales process become more similar to how homes are… View All Posts What Our Clients Have to Say. Previous “Shannon Jones and her team guided us through the successful sale of our townhome, providing helpful pre-sale advice and great support throughout the entire sale and escrow process. She and Brad Jones were very knowledgeable about the local market and shared that information with us, while Kay in the office gave us great support with all the paperwork. Most importantly, I was laid while our condo was on the market so we were unable to move forward on purchasing our house. They graciously put everything on hold until we were financially ready to re-start the process: no pressure, no questions, no repeated contact. Just an assurance that once we were ready they would be willing to work with us. And once we were able to proceed they quickly set to work, gathering our criteria for what we were looking for, and helped us quickly find the home we’re in today. I would be very comfortable recommending the Jones team to friends looking to find a reliable, effective, and trustworthy realtor.” Jim M. “Shannon and Brad made the whole home-buying- and cross-country relocation process seamless and headache-free.

thought: The extracted text does not show any obvious signs of the common characteristics of a scam website. There are no unusually low prices, no claims of getting large amounts of money, and no evident targeting of human psychological weaknesses. The website appears to be for a real estate team serving the Long Beach area, which is a legitimate type of business. However, to be thorough, I should check the domain information to ensure the company's legitimacy and see if there are any red flags there.

thought: The WHOIS data indicates that the domain showmehome.com is registered, has been active since 2003, and is using a privacy service to keep registrant details private, which is common practice. The domain is also associated with reputable name servers and is registered with GoDaddy, a well-known domain registrar. There are no immediate red flags here suggesting it is a scam. Furthermore, the content extracted from the website appears to be legitimate and related to a real estate business. There are no signs that it is a fake shopping site or that it exhibits any typical characteristics of a scam website. The website seems to have a clear purpose and provides contact information and services related to real estate. I believe that I now have enough information to make a conclusion. I now know the final answer The website https://showmehome.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The domain has been active since 2003 with no suspicious activities related to the domain's registration. The content of the website is consistent with a legitimate real estate business providing services contact information and real estate listings. There are no typical scam characteristics such as unusually low prices unrealistic money claims targeting psychological weaknesses or non-existent companies.
